sentences.sContent: Its versatility, flexibility, and wide range of implementations and environments make it difficult to describe procedures to cover all cases.
sentences.sContent_eng: Its versatility, flexibility, and wide range of implementations and environments make it difficult to describe procedures to cover all cases.
sentences.sCn: 其通用性、灵活性以及广泛的实现和环境，使得描述能涵盖所有情况的过程非常困难。

synos.tran: 多功能性；多才多艺；用途广泛

words.tran: 多才多艺的；通用的，万能的；多面手的
